title: Provided that where the Scheme is to be implemented on a plot in Industrial Zone where the Planning
clause_text: Provided that where the Scheme is to be implemented on a plot in Industrial Zone where the Planning Authority has duly permitted Residential user under the relevant provisions of the Development Control Regulations :-
